badSyntaxSQLExpression: Bad syntax in SQL expression. Correct the errors.
layerLoadFailNoFields: Layer failed to load. Fields could not be retrieved for the editor.
noLayerProvidedNoFields: No layer was provided. Fields could not be retrieved for the editor.
tileSelectArcadeUseCase1: Calculations that require more functionality than SQL including spatial operations
tileSelectSqlUseCase2: Calculations that can be expressed in SQL
tileSelectSqlUseCase3: Layers with Sync or that have Keep track of created or updated features enabled
